SEARCH

Class SocialNetworkGraph

java.lang.Object
SocialNetworkGraph
public class SocialNetworkGraph extends Object
A class to represent a social network graph. The graph is represented by a map of people and their friendships.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) Map<Person,List<Person>>
    friendships
    Map of friendships by person.
    (package private) Map<String,Person>
    people
    Map of people in the network.

    • bfs

      private void bfs(Person start, Set<Person> visited, List<Person> cluster)
      Helper method to perform BFS to find a cluster of friends
      Parameters:
      start - Person to start the BFS from
      visited - Set of visited persons
      cluster - List to store the cluster
